import React, {useEffect} from 'react'; import { useQuery, gql, ApolloProvider} from '@apollo/client'; import RefreshButton from './components/Button/RefreshButton'; const V3_SUBGRAPH_DATA = gql` query GetTopPools { pools(first: 10, orderBy: totalValueLockedUSD, orderDirection: desc, after: null) { id totalValueLockedUSD volumeUSD }, tokens(first: 10, orderBy: name, orderDirection: desc) { id symbol totalValueLocked volumeUSD }, swaps(first: 10, skip: 0, orderBy: timestamp, orderDirection: desc) { id amountUSD timestamp sender } } `; function App() { const { loading, error, data, refetch } = useQuery(V3_SUBGRAPH_DATA); useEffect(() => { console.log('data', data) }, [data]); if (loading) return

Pool ID Total Value Locked (USD) 24Hr Volume (USD)
{pool.id} {pool.totalValueLockedUSD} {pool.volumeUSD}

Tokens

Token ID Symbol totalValueLocked Volume
{token.id} {token.symbol} {token.totalValueLocked} {token.volumeUSD}

Transactions

Token ID Total Value Timestamp Sender
{swap.id} {swap.amountUSD} {swap.timestamp} {swap.sender}
); } export default App;
